function Intelligence_LV3()
    -- //以下、教養LV.3の場合でのイベント
    -- .女装稽古【教養】LV.3「女子力向上レッスン-女装少年ｖｓ幼児軍団-」

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")


    -- //BU：アキラ（部屋着・通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM14.wav",0,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1456.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "Alright, let's do our best at training again today."
「よーし、今日も稽古をがんばるぞい」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1315.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Eh, why did you suddenly start a parody?"
「え、何で唐突にパロディを始めたんです？」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1457.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "...Huh?"
「……はえ？」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1316.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "So there really are people besides Dede's husband and Aoba-chan who naturally say 'zoi'."
「素で『ぞい』って言っちゃうヒト、デデの旦那と青葉ちゃん以外にいたんですね」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1317.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Well, it's good to have motivation like a young employee. This time, you'll be doing a somewhat unusual training outdoors."
「まぁ若手社員みたいにヤル気があるのはいいことです。今回も、野外でちょっと変わった稽古をしてもらいますからね」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1458.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "Unusual training!? What exactly are we starting!?"
「変わった稽古！？　一体何が始まるの！？」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1318.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Mufufu. I found some interesting info while browsing Yuriai Private Academy's website."
「むふふー。百合愛学園のサイトを見てたら面白い情報を見つけましてねえ」]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1319.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "At Yuriai Private Academy, they apparently recruit volunteers on weekends to engage in volunteer activities."
「百合愛学園では、週末に有志を募って、ボランティア活動を行っているそうじゃないですか」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1459.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "Ah, right. I heard that under Uran-san’s organization, they do things like picking up trash and helping out at a nearby nursery."
「ああ、そうだね。ウランさんの取り仕切りで、ゴミ拾いや近所の託児所のお手伝いをしてるって聞いたよ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1320.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "This time, you, Mina-chin, will also join the nursery helper effort. It's called the Cross-dressing Nursery Teacher Operation!"
「今回はその託児所のお手伝いに、ミナちんにも参加いただきます。名付けて、女装保母さん大作戦です！」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1460.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "Cr-cross-dressing nursery teacher operationーーーーー!?"
「じょ、女装保母さん大作戦ーーーーー！？」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- 　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：校門前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG005aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM11.wav",0,true)

    -- //SE：騒ぐ声・ループ開始
--PLAY_SE("SEf017.wav",0,true)

    MSG([[I applied to participate in the volunteer work exactly as Akira said, and the day finally arrived.
アキラに言われるがままボランティアへの参加の申請をし、当日を迎えた。]])

    MSG([[An unfamiliar scene was spreading out in front of the school gate.
校門前に見慣れない光景が広がっている。]])

    -- //BU：ウラン（笑顔）、モブ女子生徒×２
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,-350,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(75,350,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0996.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "Hello everyone<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Have you all been good children this past week?"
「皆さん、こんにちわ<sprite="Emoji" name="note">　この一週間、ちゃーんといい子にしていましたか？」]])

    -- //SE：騒ぐ声・ループ停止
--STOP_SE("SEf017.wav")

    -- //BU：モブ子ども×いっぱい
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
    LAYER_ALPHA(60,0)
    LAYER_ALPHA(65,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(50,950,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-950,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(60,650,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-650,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(65,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,800,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-800,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,500,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,-500,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0043")
    MSG([[
【Children】
 "We've been very goodーーーーーーー!!!!"
「いい子にしてたーーーーーーー！！！！」]])

    MSG([[Many children had gathered in front of Uran-san and the two people who appeared to be her “knights.”
ウランさんとその『騎士』と思われる二人の前に、たくさんの子どもたちが集まっている。]])

    MSG([[They were all children from the nearby nursery who come to Yuriai Private Academy on days without classes to enjoy the walking paths and playground.
みんな近くの託児所の子どもたちで、授業のない日には散歩道や遊び場として、百合愛学園に来てもらっているそうだ。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ウラン（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0997.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "Oh my, everyone is full of energy today, that's wonderful."
「あらあら。今日も元気もいっぱいで、素晴らしいですわね」]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0998.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "Let's play lots with the older sisters today, alright?"
「今日もお姉ちゃんたちと、いーっぱい遊びましょうね」]])

    -- //BU：モブ子ども×いっぱい
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,500,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-500,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,200,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(75,-200,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0044")
    MSG([[
【Children】
 "Waaーーーーーーay!!!!"
「わぁーーーーーーーい！！！！」]])

    MSG([[The children, who had been noisy earlier, apparently were very attached to Uran-san; they listened attentively and responded cheerfully.
よほどウランさんに懐いているのか、先ほどまで騒がしかった子どもたちがちゃんとウランさんの話に耳を傾け、元気に返事をしている。]])

    MSG([[Is this what Akira meant by ‘maternal affection’? I can't seem to imitate it at all.
これがアキラの言っていた『母性』ってヤツかな。
    　ボクにはとても真似できそうにない。]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0999.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "For today's good children, we have a new older sister coming. Now, together, let's give a lively greeting to Sister Erika<sprite="Emoji" name="note">"
「今日はいい子の皆さんのために、新しいお姉ちゃんが来てくれましたよ。さぁ一緒に、エリカお姉ちゃんに元気よく挨拶しましょうねえ<sprite="Emoji" name="note">」]])

    -- //BU：ウラン（笑顔）、モブ子ども×いっぱい
    -- LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB03aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB03aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB03aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(60,500,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB03aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(65,-500,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB03aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(70,200,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB03aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(75,-200,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RYU01ea")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_1000.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "Alright, Erica-oneechan, helloー<sprite="Emoji" name="note">"
「はい、エリカお姉ちゃん、こんにちわー<sprite="Emoji" name="note">」]])

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0045")
    MSG([[
【Children】
 "Hellooooーーー!!!"
「こんにちわぁぁぁーーーーーーー！！！」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2601.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "H-helloー"
「こ、こんにちわー」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[I was a bit taken aback by the childish enthusiasm.
子どもならではの勢いに一歩引いてしまった。]])

    MSG([[I like kids and find them cute, but this was my first time interacting while cross-dressing, so I was full of anxiety.
子どもは可愛くて好きだけど、女装状態で触れ合うのは初めてだから不安がいっぱいだ。]])

    MSG([[At this rate, I won't be able to reach the goal Akira set for me.
これじゃあアキラに課せられた目標を達成できない。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2602.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 (They want me to work as a nursery teacher to learn ‘maternal affection’... Akira really asks the impossible.)
（保母さんを務めて『母性』を学べだなんて……アキラも無茶言うよ）]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[Today, I’m supposed to spend the whole day at the gymnasium taking care of the kids.
今日はこれから体育館で一日子どもの相手をする予定。]])

    MSG([[Already, I'm worried about whether I can handle it.
こんな調子で大丈夫かと、早くも心配になってきた。]])

    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RYU01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_1001.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "You don't look so well. Are you alright?"
「顔色が優れませんけど、大丈夫ですか？」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2603.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "Ah—G-Gomen nasai. This is my first time dealing with kids, so I don't really know what to do."
「あ――ご、ごめんなさい。子どもの相手なんて初めてで、勝手がわからなくて」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_1002.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "Fufu, everyone says the same thing at first. I'm sure you’ll get used to it soon, Erika-san."
「ふふ、初めは皆さん同じことをおっしゃいますわ。エリカさんなら、きっとすぐに慣れますよ」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RYU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_1003.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "Today, between us, our status as ‘Princess’ or other circumstances don't matter. Let's work together to make the children smile."
「今日はわたくしたちの間に、『姫』としての身分も、その他の事情も関係ありません。一緒に子どもたちを笑顔にしましょうね」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2604.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "Y-yes!"
「は、はい！」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：ウラン（笑顔）、モブ子ども×いっぱい
    -- LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB03aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB03aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB03aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(60,500,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB03aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(65,-500,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB03aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(70,200,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB03aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(75,-200,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RYU01ea")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_1004.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "Well then, everyone. We're moving to the usual gymnasium, so follow big sister Uran closely, okay?"
「では、皆さん。いつもの体育館に移動するから、ウランお姉ちゃんのあとに、しっかり付いてきてくださいねー」]])

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0046")
    MSG([[
【Children】
 "Yeーーーーees!!!!"
「はぁーーーーーーーい！！！！」]])

    -- //BU：なし

    -- //effect：ウランのあとに子どもが付いていくようBUをフェードアウト
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,500,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-900,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,200,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,-800,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(70,-100,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(75,-500,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(80,-300,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(65,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(70,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(75,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(80,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(1000)

    MSG([[Led by Uran-san, the group of children began to move.
ウランさんに先導され、子どもたちの集団が移動を開始した。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG005ae")
    LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,200,200)
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-2500,440)

    -- //BU：モブ子ども、モブ女子生徒
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BUL_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[But there were some children who slipped out of line, and the two ‘knights’ apparently accompanying Uran-san gently guided them back in.
でも中には列から外れてしまう子どもがいて、それをウランさんの『騎士』らしき二人が優しく列へと戻していく。]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran-knight_0014.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran's Knight】
 "Hey hey, that’s a road so it’s dangerous, okay? Let’s get back in line."
「はーい、そっちは道路だから危ないですよー？　戻りましょうねえ」]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,300,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-900,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,-300,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,1900,440)
    -- //BU：モブ子ども×２、モブ女子生徒
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BUL_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("colour-kid_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
【Brown-haired Child】
 "Hey Jun! Don’t step on my foot!"
「おいジュン！　オレのあし、ふんづけるなよー！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("blackhair-kid_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
【Black-haired Child】
 "S-Sorry, Akkun! I didn’t mean to!"
「ご、ごめん、アッくん！　わざとじゃないよ！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("colour-kid_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
【Brown-haired Child】
 "You say that, but you always step on me! Enough already!"
「そういってオマエ、いつもふんでくるじゃん！　いいかげんにしろよな！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran-knight_0015.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran's Knight】
 "Hey now, if you keep fighting, Uran-oneechan won’t play with you. So, let’s all stick together, okay?"
「ほらほら、ケンカしてたらウランお姉ちゃんに遊んでもらえなくなるよ？
    　ちゃんとあとに付いていこうね？」]])

    -- //BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-900,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-300,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,300,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,1000,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2605.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "...Ah!"
「……は！」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[I had been captivated by that peaceful scene, but then realized I was left behind and hurried to catch up.
その平和な光景に思わず目を奪われていたボクは、置いてけぼりになっていることに気付き、慌てて追いついた。]])

    MSG([[Indeed, even from my perspective as a non-child, Uran-san and the others’ manner was very feminine, or rather, full of ‘maternal affection.’
確かに、ウランさんたちの振る舞いはもう子どもじゃないボクからしても、とても女性らしいというか、『母性』が感じられる。]])

    MSG([[It's a manner I certainly can't imitate.
ボクにはなかなか真似できない振る舞いだ。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2606.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 (Can a guy like me really pull off behavior like that?)
（男のボクに……あんな振る舞いができるのかな）]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[Once the real interaction with the children at the gymnasium began—my anxieties were validated.
体育館で本格的に子どもと触れ合う時間が始まると――ボクの不安は的中することになった。]])

    -- //BG：体育館
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG018aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000)
    -- //SE：騒ぐ声・ループ開始
--PLAY_SE("SEf017.wav",0,true)

    -- //BU：ウラン（笑顔）、モブ子ども×いっぱい
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,500,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-500,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,200,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(75,-200,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_1005.wav")
